entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to Load iOS Platform Specific Image #16768
  • Resize and Downsize function in W2DImage class is not implemented on windows #16767
  • Linking of native static library fails and the resulting package is including the native reference #16764
  • Deleted Android Foreground Service UI is not Re-instated #16761
  • Provide Static MauiContextAccessor #16759
    Backlog
  • UseMauiEmbedding extension does not use specified TApp #16757
    Under Consideration
  • Windows image localization papercut #16755
  • Windows Picker TextColor on PointerOver has no effect #16751
    Under Consideration
  • Shell ContentTemplate could not be created from non-default constructor DataTemplate #16747

Closed

  • [Testing] Modify our CI Template Tests so that TreatWarningsAsErrors is enabled #16709
    .NET 8 GA
  • WebView does not support setPointerCapture when mouse leaves the control #16727
  • AmbiguousMatchException when BindableProperty is hidden in a derived class and is then set in XAML #13962
    Under Consideration
  • Date format error for September #16728
  • [ VS & .NET 8 ] MAUI Android/iOS causes error and can't be built, .csproj file can't be shown #16008
    Backlog
  • The project doesn't know how to run the profile with name 'Windows Machine' and command 'MsixPackage'. #14862
  • MAUI Blazor Project Publish Bug #14732
  • CollectionView items have extra space on Windows #15492
    .NET 8
  • Improve feedback from UI Tests when failing to navigate to next test #16674
    Backlog
  • Touch scroll is not working in a scroll view when adding pinch gesture to the child. #5612
    Backlog
  • Obsolete FocusChangeRequested #14299
    Backlog
  • MAUI build fails on Nuget Restore Task on Azure Hosted Devops Agent #16745

PullRequests

Created

  • Tests: Add support for connected component analysis #16770
    area/testing, community ✨
  • Remove the explicit RID on Mac Catalyst samples #16765
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Default paths for Appium projects, to simplify run steps #16763
    area/testing
  • [windows] fix memory leak in ListView #16762
    area/ListView, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • MauiEmbedding extensions should use specified TApp type #16758
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Try and enable Windows device tests on net7.0 #16756
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Update VisualElement docs #16754
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • Streamline SwipeView Children #16753
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA
  • [windows] Fix Picker PointerOver TextColor (#16751) #16752
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-picker, Under Consideration

Merged

  • [tests] Enable TreatWarningsAsErrors=true #16766
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • [UITest] Add reset to test teardown if the app is not running anymore #16769
    area/testing
  • [X] avoid AmbiguousMatchException #15873
    area/Xaml </>, Under Consideration
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16690
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ios] fix memory leak in Picker #16685
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [UITest] Add more logging and restart in setup #16687
    area/testing
  • Obsolete VisualElement.FocusChangeRequested event #16750
    t/breaking 💥, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮

Updated

  • Document Brush & Colors #16738
    area/docs 📓, .NET 8 GA
  • Rename Accelerator to KeyboardAccelerator #16740
    area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • Add a UI test for tapping on a label span #16222
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Add Position property to DragStartingEventArgs and DragEventArgs #16335
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix the OnNavigatedTo event and the OnAppearing event to return the ScrollToAsync method call #16619
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration
  • Don't force the RID to be x64 #16678
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Use the new device runners #16719
    area/testing
  • [Housekeeping] Review all the pending TODOs comments related with .NET 8 #16670
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Add a "VSCode" target to open the "maui.code-workspace". #16732
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [macOS] Implement IsEnabled property in MenuFlyoutItems #14920
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-contextmenu, .NET 8 GA
  • Import Keyboard Extension APIs #16572
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA
  • [ios] test MemoryAnalyzers package #16346
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • Added Device ID to Essentials.DeviceInfo #16290
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Update Windows App SDK #16610
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [core] use factory methods for registering services #16741
    area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 GA
  • Document IElementHandler #16706
    area/docs 📓, .NET 8 GA
  • Subscribes to the property chain upto the application for theme binding. #8957
    community ✨, area/theme, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, Under Consideration
  • Moves Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Gtk into the Maui repo #9522
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Try Swizzling UIViews for better OnLoad #14342
    Under Consideration
  • [X] x:Type and x:Static don't expand to Extension #15903
    area/Xaml </>, Under Consideration
  • Platfrom/Android: fix toolbar text color #14800
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar, Under Consideration
  • Controls(Android): fix frame background color #14917
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Fix iOS picker placeholder text overrided (#15139) #15198
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • [Handlers] Make sure to update Content on handlers when the ControlTemplate changes #15656
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Add size update for Shell Popup Overlay after rotation #15866
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Make WinUI FilePicker FutureAccessList more robust #16026
    area/essentials 🍞, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Fix WordWrap not working when Padding is set on Label #16136
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label, Under Consideration
  • Fix support for VisualDiagnosticsOverlay/IWindowOverlay on Android Shell Apps #16138
    platform/android 🤖, area/tooling ⚙️, area/shell 🐢, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image, Under Consideration
  • [net7.0] Make CollectionView on iOS measure to content size #15652
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [Android] Fix Border RoundRectangle CornerRadius issue #14995
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-border, .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Fix CollectionView broken test #15584
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch, Under Consideration
  • Add property for tapping on page to close soft input keyboard #16530
    area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix Keyboard.Numeric issue on DisplayPromptAsync #16163
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #16640
    area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 7 + Servicing
